name: Kiran Rawat
intro: I am a hardworking and self-motivated person who doesn't easily give up on the challenges. My peers describe me as a confident person with excellent presentation skills. I have a knack for solving puzzles and understanding complex problems. I like to have a positive outlook on my work and strive for perfection in my daily tasks. According to my peers, I get along well with people and never hesitate to ask questions.  Looking at my past, I can say that I have a lot to learn, and I am willing to give my 100% for my next project. In today's innovative culture, data is a massive part in deciding the company's future. I want to utilize my skills as a Software Engineer and Data Scientist to create a progressive environment. In my 5+ years of experience, I have steered successful projects in both small and large teams.

skills.ML Libraries: Pytorch, Keras, TensorFlow, Scikit Learn, Pandas, NumPy, H2O, XGboost,CatBoost, LightGBM, SVM
skills.Languages: Python, R, Java, PHP, Angular, Bash Scripting, JavaScript, SQL
skills.Development and Deployment Tools: Openshift, Docker, Kubernetes, Git, JIRA, Jupyter, VS Code, RStudio
skills.Hadoop Ecosystems: HDFS, Kafka, Map Reduce, Hadoop Streaming

workexperience.Responsibilities: Collected and processed mining exploration data, Performed oversampling using SMOTE(Synthetic Minority Oversampling Technique), Developed decision tree and deep learning classifers to predict the gold distribution at SSR’s Gold mine site.
workexperience.Skills: Spark, S3, EC2, XGboost, LightGBM, CatBoost, Random Forest, SVM, H2O, MultiLayerPerceptron.

workexperience.Responsibilities: Provided assistance with assignments and lectures to 111 undergraduate students.

Worked on various UI modules written in AngularJS and designed intuitive and useful interfaces based on client demands., Gathered requirements from the client on a daily basis and developed high-level diagrams and designs to incorporate new features in existing application.,Followed agile methodology for development and testing process.
workexperience.Skills: MySQL, Typescript, Java, HTML5, JQuery, CSS, Spring MVC.

workexperience.Responsibilities: Worked as the sole programmer on this project, handled requirement gathering, designing, coding and releasing timely deliverables on the production environment.
workexperience.skills: PHP, jQuery, AJAX, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, MySQL, SVN, JSON.

education.Key Courses: Machine Learning, Statistical Learning and Prediction, Programming in Big Data, Visualization, Big Data Systems, Algorithm in Big Data

projects.title: Understanding Global Poverty Using Visualization, Simon Fraser University
projects.about: Developed a visualization dashboard by utilizing visualization principles to understand the global poverty and various factors related to it.

projects.title: Predicting Stable Portfolios using Machine Learning and Deep Learning
projects.about: Analyzed effect of sentiments of SEC filings on stock prices of S&P500 companies and predicted a stable portfolio based on sentiment scores and OHLC data using neural networks.

projects.title: NYC Taxi Analysis, Simon Fraser University
projects.about: Performed ETL using PySpark and analyzed the dataset to provide the insights on how the taxi vendors in NYC can improve their business. Visualized the results using Kibana framework.

blogs.title: Predicting Stable Portfolios Using Machine Learning
